name: Thunderstrike - Clergy of Thunder
text: If you control a Level 7 or higher "Thunderstrike" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this face-up card on the field; add 1 "Thunderstrike" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can only Special Summon Thunder type monsters for the rest of the turn. You can only activate each effect of "Thunderstrike - Clergy of Thunder" once per turn.
